snippet.title: Selene's Unbearable Night First Chapter [Gameplay Trailer]
snippet.description:
Download the game:
https://farelas.itch.io/selenes-unbearable-night

Know the story of Selene.

A woman who is kidnapped and her only goal is to escape, but on the way she discovers that behind all this lies a darker secret than she could ever have imagined.

A third person survival horror game. Search for key objects, solve puzzles and face dangers in order to escape.

Stealth, ranged or melee choose your way to play!

If you want Selene's story to continue, the only way to do it is with the support of the community so that this can grow and be completed.

The game is still in a very early stage of development. This is only the first chapter of the game, but thanks to the good reception that the first version had, I decided to expand the story of Selene, in the hope of turning this project into a full game with the help of the community.

If you liked “Project Selene” I invite you to take a look at my other game that I am currently working on, since it is a similar experience: 

UNBEARABLE: https://farelas.itch.io/unbearable
